Package com.dua3.utility.text

Class AnsiConverter.AnsiConverterImpl

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.text.AttributeBasedConverter.AttributeBasedConverterImpl<String>
com.dua3.utility.text.AnsiConverter.AnsiConverterImpl
Enclosing class:
AnsiConverter
protected class AnsiConverter.AnsiConverterImpl extends AttributeBasedConverter.AttributeBasedConverterImpl<String>
Implementation of an ANSI conversion utility for rich text to ANSI formatted text. This class extends the AttributeBasedConverterImpl<String> to facilitate conversion of text with style attributes into ANSI escape code formatted text.

    • applyFontChanges

      protected void applyFontChanges(FontDef changes)
      Applies font changes to the ANSI conversion buffer based on the given font definition. This method appends the appropriate ANSI escape codes to the buffer for each defined font style present in the FontDef object.
      Parameters:
      changes - an object representing the font definition containing attributes such as color, bold, underline, strike-through, and italic.
